#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long prime[1000002];
vector<long long > v,p;
int main()
{
    //cout<<sqrt(1000000000)<<endl;
    for(int i=1;i<=100070;++i)
        prime[i]=1;
    prime[1]=0;
    for(long long i=2;i*i<=(100000);++i)
    {
        if(prime[i] == 1)
        {

            for(long long  j=i*i;j<=100000;j+=i)
            {
                prime[j] = 0;
            }

        }
    }

for(long long i=2;i<=100000;i++)
{
    if(prime[i]==1)
        v.push_back(i*i) ;
}
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    while(n--)
    {
        int l,r;
        cin>>l>>r;
        /*for(int i=0;i<=30;++i)
            cout<<v[i]<<" ";
        cout<<endl;*/

        int a = (int)(lower_bound(v.begin() , v.end() , l) - v.begin());
        int b = (int)(upper_bound(v.begin() , v.end() , r) - v.begin());
        int ans = b-a;
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
}
